error_analysis.name: Critical Errors
error_analysis.query: @l = 'Error' and (@mt like '%Exception%' or @mt like '%Failed%' or @mt like '%Critical%')
error_analysis.description: Find all critical errors and exceptions

error_analysis.name: WebSocket Connection Issues
error_analysis.query: Source like 'Docker-*' and (@mt like '%WebSocket%' or @mt like '%connection%') and @l in ['Error', 'Warning']

performance_monitoring.name: Slow Response Times
performance_monitoring.query: @mt like '%ms%' and (@mt like '%slow%' or @mt like '%timeout%' or @mt like '%delay%')

performance_monitoring.name: High Memory Usage
performance_monitoring.query: @mt like '%memory%' and (@l in ['Warning', 'Error'] or @mt like '%high%' or @mt like '%usage%')

performance_monitoring.name: Container Resource Issues
performance_monitoring.query: LogType = 'DockerContainer' and (@mt like '%CPU%' or @mt like '%memory%' or @mt like '%disk%') and @l in ['Warning', 'Error']

operational_insights.name: API Request Patterns
operational_insights.query: @mt like '%GET %' or @mt like '%POST %' or @mt like '%PUT %' or @mt like '%DELETE %'

dashboards.name: AutoBot System Overview
queries: select Source, count(*) as MessageCount from stream group by Source
select @l as Level, count(*) as Count from stream where @t >= Now() - 1h group by @l
select ContainerName, count(*) as LogCount from stream where LogType = 'DockerContainer' group by ContainerName

dashboards.name: Error Analytics
queries: select @t, Source, @mt from stream where @l = 'Error' order by @t desc
select Source, count(*) as ErrorCount from stream where @l = 'Error' and @t >= Now() - 1h group by Source
select @mt, count(*) as Frequency from stream where @l = 'Error' group by @mt order by count(*) desc

dashboards.name: Performance Metrics
queries: select @t, Source, @mt from stream where @mt like '%ms' or @mt like '%seconds' order by @t desc
select ContainerName, count(*) as ActivityLevel from stream where LogType = 'DockerContainer' and @t >= Now() - 15m group by ContainerName
